name: Terraformer
description: Have a terraform rating of 35 (or 26 with Turmoil.)

name: Mayor
description: Own 3 city tiles

name: Gardener
description: Own 3 greenery tiles

name: Builder
description: Have 8 building tags in play

name: Planner
description: Have 16 cards in your hand

name: Generalist
description: Have increased all 6 productions by 1 step

name: Specialist
description: Have 10 in production of any resource

name: Ecologist
description: Have 4 bio tags in play (plant, microbe and animal tags count as bio tags)

name: Tycoon
description: Have 15 project cards in play (not events.)

name: Legend
description: Have 5 cards in your event pile

name: Diversifier
description: Have 8 different tags in play

name: Tactician
description: Have 5 cards with requirements in play

name: Polar Explorer
description: Own 3 tiles on the two bottom rows

name: Energizer
description: Have 6 energy production

name: Rim Settler
description: Have 3 Jovian tags in play

name: Hoverlord
description: Have 7 floater resources on your cards

name: Networker
description: Have placed 3 tiles adjacent to tiles that grant adjacency bonuses

name: One Giant Step
description: Have 6 moon tags

name: Lunarchitect
description: Own 6 Moon tiles

name: Colonizer
description: Have 4 colonies

name: Farmer
description: Have 4 plant production

name: Minimalist
description: Have no more than 2 cards in hand

name: Terran
description: Have 6 Earth tags in play

name: Tropicalist
description: Own 3 tiles in the middle 3 equatorial rows

name: Economizer
description: Have 5 heat production

name: Pioneer
description: Have 3 colonies

name: Land Specialist
description: Own 3 special (normally, brown) tiles

name: Martian
description: Have 4 Mars tags in play

name: Businessperson
description: Have 6 Earth tags in play

name: Collector
description: Have 3 sets of automated (green), active (blue) and event (red) project cards in play

name: Firestarter
description: Have 20 heat

name: Terra Pioneer
description: Own 5 tiles on Mars

name: Spacefarer
description: Have 6 space tags in play

name: Gambler
description: Fund 2 awards

name: Electrician
description: Have 4 power tags in play

name: Smith
description: Have a total of 7 steel and titanium production

name: Tradesman
description: Have 3 different types of non-standard resources

name: Irrigator
description: Own 4 tiles adjacent to oceans

name: Capitalist
description: Have 64 M€

name: Risktaker
description: Have at least 3 NEGATIVE VPs among your cards. (Event cards count.)

name: Tunneler
description: Have at least 7 excavation markers

name: Landlord
description: Own the most tiles

name: Scientist
description: Have the most science tags in play

name: Banker
description: Have the most M€ production

name: Thermalist
description: Have the most heat

name: Miner
description: Have the most steel and titanium

name: Celebrity
description: Have the most project cards in play with a base cost of at least 20 M€ (not events.)

name: Industrialist
description: Have most steel and energy

name: Desert Settler
description: Own the most tiles south of the equator (the four bottom rows)

name: Estate Dealer
description: Own the most tiles adjacent to ocean tiles

name: Benefactor
description: Have the highest terraform rating

name: Cultivator
description: Own the most greenery tiles

name: Magnate
description: Have the most automated (green) project cards in play

name: Space Baron
description: Have the most space tags in play

name: Excentric
description: Have the most resources on cards in play

name: Contractor
description: Have the most building tags in play

name: Venuphile
description: Have the most Venus tags in play

name: Entrepreneur
description: Own the most tiles that grant adjacency bonuses

name: Full Moon
description: Have the most Moon tags in play

name: Lunar Magnate
description: Own the most tiles on The Moon

name: Curator
description: Have the most tags of any one type in play

name: Engineer
description: Have the most cards in play that directly alter your own production

name: Historian
description: Have the most cards in your event pile

name: Tourist
description: Have the most empty spaces adjacent to your tiles

name: A. Zoologist
description: Own the most animal and microbe resources

name: Cosmic Settler
description: Own the most cities not on Mars

name: Botanist
description: Have the most plant production

name: Coordinator
description: Have the most cards in your event pile

name: Zoologist
description: Have the most animal resources

name: Manufacturer
description: Have the most active (blue) project cards in play

name: Biologist
description: Have the most animal, plant, and microbe tags in play

name: T. Economizer
description: Have the most project cards in play with a base cost of 10 M€ or less (not events.)

name: Politician
description: Place the most delegates

name: Urbanist
description: Have the most VP from city tile adjacencies on Mars

name: Warmonger
description: Play the most cards that reduce other players' resources or production

name: Adapter
description: Have the most cards with requirements in play

name: Edgedancer
description: Own the most tiles on the edges of the board

name: Hoarder
description: Have the most cards in hand

name: Naturalist
description: Have the most plant and heat production

name: Voyager
description: Have the most Jovian tags in play

name: Kingpin
description: Play the highest number of cards with a corruption requirement of at least 1. (Event cards count)

name: EdgeLord
description: Have the highest number of excavation markers on the edges of the board.
